import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import Link from 'next/link'; import { notification } from 'antd'; import SearchHeader from './modules/SearchHeader'; import MiniCart from './modules/MiniCart'; import AccountQuickLinks from './modules/AccountQuickLinks'; import { logOut } from '../../../store/auth/action'; import CurrencyDropdown from './modules/CurrencyDropdown'; import { stickyHeader } from '../../../utilities/common-helpers'; class HeaderAutoPart extends Component { constructor({ props }) { super(props); } componentDidMount() { if (process.browser) { window.addEventListener('scroll', stickyHeader); } } handleFeatureWillUpdate(e) { e.preventDefault(); notification.open({ message: 'Opp! Something went wrong.', description: 'This feature has been updated later!', duration: 500, }); } render() { const menuAutopart = [ { text: 'Interior', url: '/shop', }, { text: 'Exterior', url: '/shop', }, { text: 'Body parts', url: '/shop', }, { text: 'Wheels & Tires', url: '/shop', }, { text: 'Lighting', url: '/shop', }, { text: 'Performance', url: '/shop', }, { text: 'Repare part', url: '/shop', }, { text: 'Tools & Garage', url: '/shop', }, ]; const { auth } = this.props; return (

    {menuAutopart.map((menuItem) => (
  • {menuItem.text}

); } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return state; }; export default connect(mapStateToProps)(HeaderAutoPart);
